argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | pmapsubcl.b | |- B = ( Base ` K ) |
| 2 |  | pmapsubcl.m | |- M = ( pmap ` K ) |
| 3 |  | pmapsubcl.c | |- C = ( PSubCl ` K ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Atoms ` K ) = ( Atoms ` K ) |
| 5 | 1, 4, 2 | #P_pmapssat | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B ) -> ( M ` X ) C_ ( Atoms ` K ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( _|_P ` K ) = ( _|_P ` K ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 6 | #P_2polpmapN | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B ) -> ( ( _|_P ` K ) ` ( ( _|_P ` K ) ` ( M ` X ) ) ) = ( M ` X ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 6, 3 | #P_ispsubclN | |- ( K e. HL -> ( ( M ` X ) e. C <-> ( ( M ` X ) C_ ( Atoms ` K ) /\ ( ( _|_P ` K ) ` ( ( _|_P ` K ) ` ( M ` X ) ) ) = ( M ` X ) ) ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B ) -> ( ( M ` X ) e. C <-> ( ( M ` X ) C_ ( Atoms ` K ) /\ ( ( _|_P ` K ) ` ( ( _|_P ` K ) ` ( M ` X ) ) ) = ( M ` X ) ) ) ) |
| 10 | 5, 7, 9 | #P_mpbir2and | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B ) -> ( M ` X ) e. C ) |
